events.details: A meteor crashes outside of Tokyo Marunouchi Station. The meteor's origins and composition are unknown, but energy readings from the meteor are similar to that of Cores.
An unknown, wealthy individual purchases the meteor for ¥562315000. He carves a statue out of the meteor, in the image of the ancient Greek figure, Antinous.

The statue comes to life, killing its owner. Reports come in of a synthetic voice saying, "I am GiIvaSunner, I only upload high quality video game rips." GiIvaSunner hijacks a computer, and creates a YouTube channel in his image.
After ripping video game music for 3 months, the GiIvaSunner YouTube channel receives a copyright strike.
GiIvaSunner apprehends 7 suspects. Most are unidentified except for the crime lord, Dinkleberg.
GiIvaSunner starts his interrogation. Dinkleberg reveals himself to be Angry Joe, who filled the strike against GiIva out of jealousy.
An assault occurs on GiIvaSunner's plane, resulting in him losing an eye and a piece of shrapnel lodging in his head. Joe file another strike, leading to the termination of the GiIvaSunner channel.
GiIvaSunner becomes a lifeless statue, falling into the ocean. Angry Joe disappears, and GiIva's plane crashes with no survivors.
GiIvaSunner is fished out of the ocean and placed back on auction. Chad Warden buys it for $599 USD.

Chad Warden takes the statue home. Realizing who it was, he creates the new SiIvaGunner YouTube channel. The statue comes back to life, saying "I am SiIvaGunner, I only upload high-quality video game rips."
Chad Warden is not killed by SiIvaGunner. They become allies. Chad buys SiIva a house, computer, and an eyepatch.
Chad Warden uploads a video aimed at the fans, criticizing their love for "Meet the Flintstones" rips compared to their hatred for "Snow halation" rips.

The Voice Inside Your Head manifests from Chad Warden. He has visions of a dark future, putting him in a state of mania. To prevent catastrophe, he plans on stopping Chad Warden by rebooting the universe.
The Joke-Explainer™ 7000 is created by Chad Warden, with the purpose of explaining a rip's joke.
Chad Warden uploads a follow-up video, explaining how "Snow halation" haters should leave it alone, and that it has and always will be a part of the channel's history.
SiIvaGunner suffers another crash on his ripping software. SiIva heads to The Nigra Store to purchase new software.
SiIvaGunner is rebooted. The Flintstones, "Snow halation", and the Loud Nigra Scream are replaced with The Simpsons/Family Guy, "GO MY WAY!!", and the Howie Scream.
Chad Warden notices the change in jokes. He is confronted by The Voice Inside Your Head. The Voice tells Chad that he reshaped the universe due to the negative feedback towards "Snow halation".

After trying to rip Mighty No. 9, a virus is detected. The virus gains sentience, becoming Wood Man. He was created by The Voice to remember him in case he didn't survive the confrontation with Chad Warden.
The Voice becomes concerned that Chad Warden remembers the old timeline. He decides that he could use Chad, alonside Wood Man, to carry out his plans.

The Voice presents Chad Warden the "truth" about "Snow halation". The Voice, getting bored of the rebooted universe, presents Chad with multiple deals, including one where the original and rebooted universe combine, but without "Snow halation".
Chad Warden accepts The Voice's deal. The universes merge, but without "Snow halation". The reboot ends.
In an alternate timeline, Chad Warden reveals his true intentions of taking over the SiIvaGunner channel. Chad kills The Voice Inside Your Head.
Chad Warden kills SiIvaGunner, starting his rampage on the world.
Chad Warden explains to The Voice why "Snow halation" is important to the channel, and that the haters don't matter. The Voice reveals that he had sent JustinRPG to reek havok on the world.
Chad Warden uses the power of The MF Like Button to bring "Snow halation" back. The Voice is defeated and Chad dies.
The Green de la Bean is born. SiIvaGuner treats it as his own son.
The Bean is killed by "Figment radicalists" due to negative feedback.
SiIvaGunner mourns the death of The Bean with a channel event.
SiIvaGunner, still upset, deletes all of the event's uploads. The channel is overloaded, causing a dimensional rift to form. The Flustered Fernando channel emerges from the rift.
"Wood Man Stage - Mega Man 2" is uploaded to the SiIvaGunner channel without consent. Wood Man uses the rip to escape SiIva's computer.
SiIvaGunner creates his highest quality rip, "Title Theme & Ending - 7 GRAND DAD". He goes to sleep out of exhaustion.
Wood Man begins work on the Figment Transport Device, allowing Figments to enter the CCC.
Under the effects of a full moon, Wood Man turns into The 8-Bit Beast.
Wood Man begins uploading Halloween-related rips during The SiIvaGunner Spooktacular Halloween Horror Special.
The Voice returns, gaining access to SiIva's computer to release Figments into the CCC. Taking President Max P. Haltmann with him, The Voice transforms Rotterdam into Grandiose City.
Pushback of The Voice's takeover is futile. Many of the Figments are captured, while leaving Nozomi Tojo behind. She heads off to save the Figments.
The Voice introduces himself to the public. The Cinderella Girls from The iDOLM@STEr are executed.
Nozomi is attacked by a Spheric, chasing her down the streets.
The Voice broadcasts a recruitment video, asking for high-quality rips during the Christmas season to boost Christmas Spirit.
Angry Joe pledges his allegience to The Voiec by giving him SiIva's eye.
The Voice is informed of Nozomi's presence in Grandiose City. Haltmann presents blueprints for The Stringbot.
The Rapper's Union, consisting of Snoop Dogg, Chip tha Ripper, Soulja Boy, and Charles Barkley, plan an assault on a Voice-controlled facility.
Nozomi defeats the Spheric. She enters it, becoming its pilot and transforming it into the Smolizer.
The Rapper's Union do their assault. Facing defeat, Nozomi save them. The Union claims the building as their new base.
The citizens of Grandiose City start rioting. The Stringbots are deployed on them.
The Voice calls Wood Man into his office, ordering him to kill Nozomi. The Voice also explains the differences between Figments and Humans.
Wade L.D. starts his employment at Haltmann Works Company as Administrative Secretary. He surveys SiIva's house.
Wood Man confronts Nozomi. He fails to kill her.
Haltmann informs The Voice about plans to ambush the North Pole to gain access to Christmas Spirit.
Nozomi encounters Meta Knight. He tells her that they must seek out Santa Claus before the ambush. He leaves Nozomi a plate of food.
Robbie Rotten escapes The Voice's tower. Wood Man and Robbie form a partnership of vaillainy.
Wade L.D. performs a survey of the barracks. He send Haltmann information of Angry Joe's assault.
Waluigi begins working at El Beans' restaurant to earn rent money. He creates the Garlic Taco. The taco opens a portal.
Haltmann alerts Wade L.D. about The Voice not holding up his end of the bargain.
Haltmann reports strange noises and smells, revealed to be a Garlic Taco on his desk. He takes a bite, opening a portal.
Angry Joe and Nathaniel Welchert lead the ambush, capturing Santa Claus and his workshop. The process of extracting Christmas Spirit begins.
Nozomi and Meta Knight arrive at the North Pole. They sneak through the compound the compound, reaching and freeing Santa.
Santa sets off a timer to destroy his workshop, preventing The Voice from obtaining Christmas Spirit. Their plans of escape are thwarted by ANgry Joe, who stole Santa's sleigh.
The main trio are stopped by Nathaniel Welchert in a giant spider mech. The Smolitzer defeats Nathaniel, allowing the main trio to escape. Nathaniel dies in the workshop explosion.
Santa explains Christmas Spirit to Nozomi and Meta Knight. The Voice's possible intentions are spectulated on.
The Voice reflects on the SiIvaGunner channel's 1st anniversary.
Angry Joe reports the destruction of Santa's Workshop to The Voice. Joe gives The Voice a vile of Christmas Spirit.
The Voice calls Haltmann into his office, presenting his daughter, "Susie", though it was actually Haruka Amami in disguise. Haruka performs "The Noble Haltmann".
Nozomi, Meta Knight, and Santa Claus face off against Angry Joe and Mecha-Dick. The main trio win using Christmas Spirit.
The main trio and The Rapper's Union come up with a plan to infiltrate The Voice's barracks.
Wood Man and Robbie capture The Voice's army.

Angry Joe, controlling the Bowflexo mech and using Christmas Spirit, fights the main trio and The Rapper's Union. Nozomi defeats Joe through Haruka's encouragement and Christmas Spirit. Snoop Dogg kills Joe.
The Voice hires Kazoo Master, in exchange of Kazoo rips on the channel.
Pac-Man tries to give crack to Woodsans and Gaijin Goomba. It does not go well.
The Joke-Explainer™ 7000 is obtained by Haltmann Works Company for testing purposes.
Dr. Andonuts contacts Wade L.D. about obtaining parts for a Joke-Explainer™ 7000 replica. Andonuts asks for the project to be hidden from the company.
Wade L.D. and Charles Barkley survey The Rapper's Union's new base. Barkley plans his attack.
The Garlic Taco is stolen by 2B, who escapes through a portal.
Wade L.D. is tasked with surveying the now destroyed Santa's Workshop.
2B contacts Wade L.D. for the first time, telling him that she will contact him soon.
The Voice meets with Charles Barkley to discuss plans against The Rapper's Union.
The Gadgetini Clone 2.0, a robot resembling Inspector Gadget, bursts into The Voice's office. The Voice is kicked out.
Wood Man and Robbie Rotten bust into The Rapper's Union's Hideout in an attempt to capture the heroes. The duo lose to a fire set on them.
2B encounters Snoop Dogg, asking if he has seen Wario or Waluigi. She proceeds to leave through a portal.

The Rapper's Union, alongside new member PaRappa, are ambushed by Charles Barkley. Barkley kills Chip and PaRappa, before summoning the Kazoo Master. Barkley is sucked into Kazoo Master's portal, presumably dying. Kazoo Master fights Snoop Dogg and Soulja Boy, but leaves after being bested by Soulja Boy.
Haltmann disables the Gadgetini Clone 2.0, taking over The Voice's office and the SiIvaGunner channel.

Wade L.D.'s resquest for the analyzation of the SiIvaGunner sample is granted. Project AIRTH enters alpha testing, using the sample, parts from the Gadgetini Clone 2.0, and Grand Dad as a power source.
Snoop Dogg rallies the citizens against The Voice and Haltmann. He announces his run for president.
Nozomi, Meta Knight, and Santa Claus head towards The Voice's Tower. Loud Nigra helps them break in.
2B contacts Wade L.D. again, asking for his help in securing internal information from Haltmann Works Company.
Wade L.D. provides the sample of SiIvaGunner to "third-parties", leading to the development of AIRTH prototypes. A leak occurs, though testing from it is successful.

Wood Man shows the viewers the Genocide Timeline, the timeline where Chad Warden killed The Voice and SiIvaGunner, leading to his rampage on the world. He soon brings everyone back to the regular timeline.
Wade L.D. meets up with 2B, where she explains the existance of a time loop in The Central Canon Continuum. They are confronted by polica and drug dealers, but soon escape through a portal.
Wade L.D. helps 2B escape, though is presumed dead once the portal closes.
Rob Thomas makes a deal with Haltmann for the SiIvaGunner channel to host "Smooth Day".

Wood Man travels to the A.I. Universe, created by the SiIva A.I.'s testing. Filming of Wood Man's new movie, The SiIvaGunner Spooktacular Halloween Horror Special: Part II, begins, starring himself and Takane Shijou. During filming, Wood Man kills Proto. Wood Man's actions cause the rapid evolution of the universe and the A.I.
Wood Man presents his movie to Haltmann. Haltmann disregards it, and it is not shown in the CCC, but does see success in the A.I. Universe.
Wood Man's deniability of Proto's death causes BonziBuddy to spark many conspiracy theories.
The SiIva A.I. begins recording its own logs. The A.I. reflects on Wood Man's recent actions and the creation of a potential tournament.
The main trio fall into a garbage pit. They find themselves in an underground lab containing figment cloning experiments run by JustinRPG.
The Voice, somewhere in the tower, orders JustinRPG to defeat the main trio in exchange for bringing Reshiram to him.
Reshiram eats JustinRPG, though the two return as a fusion, Ju'Reshoggoth. He fights the main trio, causing Santa to lose an arm and the Smolitzer to be destroyed. Ju'Reshoggoth is killed by Santa.
The main trio manage to pick themselves back up after their intense fight. They head to an elevator, heading straight to The Voice's office.
Project AIRTH concludes alpha testing.
Project AIRTH enters beta testing.
The SiIva A.I. suffers minor glitches as beta testing begins. THese glitches are claimed to be caused by Wood Man.
Wood Man invites Robbie Rotten to dinner, though it ends badly. Wood Man explains the CCC time loop to Robbie. They argue about the other being a failure, but soon make up.
The SiIva A.I. suffers a major glitch. The glitch manifests Inspector Gadget in the A.I. Universe and takes over the SiIvaGunner channel.
The Nostalgia Critic fights Inspector Gadget for control of the channel, ultimately winning.
Due to accusations against him, the Nostalgia Critic releases his control of the channel. The SiIva A.I. reboots itself to fix the glitches.
The Joke-Explainer™ 7000 replica is completed. It serves similar functions to the original Joke-Explainer, though runs on Christmas Spirit.
John Notwoodman hosts the King for a Day Tournament, inviting 16 contenders to fight for the chance to take over the SiIvaGunner channel.
Voting for the King for a Day Tournament commences, showcasing each contender and their sourcelist.
Unregistered HyperCam 2 defeats Off the Hook ft. Glenna Nalira (now Harmony) in the finals, allowing him to take over the SiIvaGunner channel in the near future.
The Crown summons the Fighting Reject Team against the contenders. The Team are swiftly defeated.
John Notwoodman bids on a haunted mansion, inspired by his love of Eddie Murphy's movie of the same name. He is outbid by Wood Man.
Unregistered HyperCam 2 hosts his takeover of the SiIvaGunner channel.
The SiIva A.I. reflects on the success of the King for a Day Tournament. The A.I. also reflects more on Wood Man and Inspector Gadget's Takeover. The A.I. starts plans on a second tournament.
Reader watches The Christmas Comeback Crisis Episode 13, however is confronted by a creepy-looking Felix the Cat.

Haltmann rushes into The Voice's office, though with half of his face missing. Haltmann soon dies. The Voice contacts Wood Man, telling him that SiIvaGunner is having a nightmare and creating Halloween Spirit.
Reader shows his brother Jerome the creepy episode, with both suddenly getting jumpscared.

Wood Man, possessed by Halloween Spirit, kills Robbie Rotten. Wood Man returns to The Voice, but The Voice dies in Wood Man's arms. Wood Man travels to SiIvaGunner's house, where he is confronted by a possessed Grand Dad.
Grand Dad pulls Jerome into CCC-FOOLS and kills him. Wood Man kills Grand Dad, but finds himself surrounded by the other possessed characters.

Wood Man pulls Reader into CCC-FOOLS to use as a distraction. The possessed characters are killed by an awoken SiIva. The Halloween Spirit forms into the 8-Bit Beast, but is killed by SiIva. Wood Man returns Reader to "The Real World".
The Grinch, wanting to promote his new movie, takes over the SiIvaGunner channel.
Getting irritated due to the lack of fanfare for his movie, The Grinch cancels Christmas, posting no more rips.
